revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR-1221 |revision=EXT |upc=655216004061 |ean= |asin=B0026N3RZ4 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/11/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model=NSR-1221 |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR32108001 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400F-7TL |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F |default_ch= }} [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=68499&sid=cd3c8d41ebfb4e593363319f73064c9e On the DD-WRT forums]
"NSR-1221-0.10 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC documents imply there is a plain ESR-1221 model without an RP-SMA connector.
On the SureWest Customized model (ESR-1221 EXT (SureWest) printed on bottom), the default password is the device's mac address in lowercase without colons. for example, Username: admin Password: 00026f893ad1
